references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many text-to-image generation techniques, including the one used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a widely used and important foundation model for text-to-image generation, which is used and modified in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a crucial component in many text-to-image models for aligning text prompts with image features, and which is leveraged in this paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces Imagen, a state-of-the-art text-to-image generation model, which the authors compare their work against.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a technique for efficiently fine-tuning large language models that is used in the current paper to improve the generation of human-centric details.
